If you're not locked into tha=
t thesis, also consider HTMLUnit, which does much of what HTTPUnit does, bu=
t differently.

As a community we are still preoccupied with beh=
avioral testing of web applications (correctness testing) and so there isn'=
t the critical mass of literature specifically on performance testing.
